name: Reverberating Bash
description: Strike an enemy full-force with your shield, dealing 1161 Physical Damage and stunning them for 3 seconds.  After the stun ends, the enemy takes an additional 1161 Physical Damage.  This ability's damage is considered Bash damage and interrupts the enemy if they are casting.
effectLines: Initial damage is halved, but stuns the target.  After the stun ends, the enemy takes the damage again.
coefDescription: Strike an enemy full-force with your shield, dealing $1 Physical Damage and stunning them for 3 seconds.  After the stun ends, the enemy takes an additional $2 Physical Damage.  This ability's damage is considered Bash damage and interrupts the enemy if they are casting.
rawDescription:
Strike an enemy full-force with your shield, dealing <<1>> and stunning them for <<2>>.

After the stun ends, the enemy takes an additional <<1>>.

This ability's damage is considered Bash damage and interrupts the enemy if they are casting.
